All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface Reactable
extends java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, javax.swing.event.MenuListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener

Legt die Schnittstellen fest welcher der Controller haben muss um, die Events des Views abzufangen.
